abilities.description: User can generate and control massive amounts of electricity and lightning.
abilities.limitations: Ineffective against rubber, which is a natural insulator.

abilities.description: Enel's ultimate technique where he condenses massive thunderclouds into a spherical mass of lightning that can destroy entire islands.
abilities.limitations: Requires significant preparation and the creation of thunderclouds.

abilities.description: As a Logia-type Devil Fruit, the user can transform into lightning and become intangible to most physical attacks.
abilities.limitations: Negated by Seastone and ineffective against insulators like rubber.

keyMoments.title: Lightning Attacks on Giant Jack
keyMoments.description: Enel uses his Goro Goro no Mi powers to launch devastating lightning attacks on Zoro and the others attempting to cut down Giant Jack.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Enel's long-range offensive capabilities and his awareness of the crew's plans.

keyMoments.title: Attacks Luffy and Nami
keyMoments.description: Enel launches lightning attacks at Luffy and Nami as they ride up the falling beanstalk toward the Ark Maxim.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Enel's attempt to stop Luffy from reaching him, though the attacks prove ineffective against Luffy's rubber body.

keyMoments.title: Raigou Preparation
keyMoments.description: Enel prepares his ultimate Raigou technique by condensing massive thunderclouds to destroy all of Skypiea.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the full destructive potential of the Goro Goro no Mi and the stakes of the final battle.

weaknesses.description: Rubber is a natural insulator and completely negates the electrical powers of the Goro Goro no Mi.
Like all Devil Fruit users, Enel is vulnerable to Seastone, which nullifies his powers.
